metadata.title: CVE-2021-37958 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Navigation in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 94.0.4606.54 allowed a remote attacker to inject scripts or HTMLinto a privileged page via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
